15 or maybe even 10,  clerics get used a lot, maybe try one of them.

> 
> Let's see:
> I have played with Soldier, Archer, Mage, and Archmage at experience
> levels higher than 150.  Where should I try out next at high

> definitely not try out faeries, skeletons, ghosts, or fire elementals
> [well, I sorta have tried out fire elementals, only summoned].
